mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.mainid AS "mainid", a.projectid AS "projectid", a.remark AS "remark", a.amount AS "amount", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.time AS "time", a.departurelocation AS "departurelocation", a.arrivedlocation AS "arrivedlocation", a.updatedate AS "updatedate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fa_reimburse_taxi( id, mainid, projectid, remark, amount, createdate, time, departurelocation, arrivedlocation, updatedate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mainid}, #{projectid}, #{remark}, #{amount}, #{createdate}, #{time}, #{departurelocation}, #{arrivedlocation}, #{updatedate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fa_reimburse_taxi SET mainid = #{mainid}, projectid = #{projectid}, remark = #{remark}, amount = #{amount}, createdate = #{createdate}, time = #{time}, departurelocation = #{departurelocation}, arrivedlocation = #{arrivedlocation}, updatedate = #{updatedate} WHERE id = #{id}
